--- In gladiator@y..., "James Trahern" <4idlamo@i...> wrote:
> Ok. maybe i didnt get the message across in my last message. That, 
or gladiator@y... deleted the subliminal message i embedded within the 
thread. 
> PLEASE visit my webpage. PLEASE read gladiator_story.rtf. failure to 
do so will result in a gang of blood-thirsty orcs coming into your 
house, howling at your dog, and eating the corpses you have stashed in 
your basement.
> A big part of writing this is to get positive feedback from other 
people reading it. If i don't get feedback, i kind of lack the 
incentive needed to continue writing. I was hoping for some big 
appreciation from 'Triad' and Dancing Corpse after finishing chapter 
6/7. Also, getting some feedback from the big man upstairs (Tom Ricket 
of course) would be cool also.

Hey, I gave you feedback.  It's good so far.
